SELECT mno, mid, mname, mnickname, mjoindate, mgrade, maddr, mphone, mprofile FROM member WHERE mid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR mnickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR maddr LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT ono, oid, oname, ojoindate, ograde, ophone, obiz, ocertificate, obank FROM owner WHERE oid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR oname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR obiz LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET mgrade=#{grade} WHERE mno=#{mno}
UPDATE owner SET ograde=#{grade} WHERE ono=#{ono}
